column2: Another one. How are you? Are you okay?
I'm alive, but barely. The predators attacked us…
And you all ran away, I know.
Skill comes with experience. You'll have to come with us, and then we'll all get back to the colony. Are you ready to go?
Of course I am! Thank you for saving me!
Thank me when we're out of here.
Yeah, but… there should be an ore deposit not far from here. We'd better find it and remember where it is.
I'm not promising anything, but I'll try to help. It'd help the lab on the Aurora 2, as well…
